name: Tales of Morrow
description:
Create your tale in a beautiful world full of adventure and exploration! Tales of Morrow is a semi-survival, adventure, action RPG where you can build on your island, start a farm, travel to other islands riddled with ruins from a past civilization, and fight all enemies who oppose you. Here you will encounter a massive and lively environment with an extensive selection of weapons, tools and plenty to explore. So grab your sword or kick back with a fishing rod under the sunset and begin your story!

Explore, build, and survive

Discover ruins and conquer your enemies



Features
- Build anything using resources you collect from the islands
- Explore procedural islands (No two islands are the same!)
- Descend into dark dungeons and ancient cities
- Encounter and defeat a wide array of enemies
- Grab your pole and angle for countless fish
- Start a farm! Scavenge and grow various crops
- + much more!
